//Generated by BehavEd

set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_AUTO, "sound/enemy/russian/soldier/sound_the_alarm.mp3" );
set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
set ( "SET_RESET_ALL_VIEWDIST", 900.000 );

affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	use ( "sound_alarms" );
	wait ( 30000.000 );
	use ( "sound_alarms" );
	use ( "no_talking" );
}
